movie.title: The Magic Snowflake
movie.description_intro: A young boy named Nicholas is about to become the next Santa Claus, but must first avoid a crisis that's threatening the magic of Christmas before he can succeed in his new role.
movie.description_full: A young boy named Nicholas is about to become the next Santa Claus, but must first avoid a crisis that's threatening the magic of Christmas before he can succeed in his new role.

movies.title: The Condor
movies.summary: After his parents are murdered and his legs crippled, Tony Valdez uses their technology and becomes a skateboarding superhero.
movies.description_full: After his parents are murdered and his legs crippled, Tony Valdez uses their technology and becomes a skateboarding superhero.
movies.synopsis: After his parents are murdered and his legs crippled, Tony Valdez uses their technology and becomes a skateboarding superhero.

movies.title: Yona Yona Penguin
movies.summary: An animated adventure about three children who travel to a fantasy land.
movies.description_full: An animated adventure about three children who travel to a fantasy land.
movies.synopsis: An animated adventure about three children who travel to a fantasy land.

movies.title: Lilo & Stitch
movies.summary: In a place far, far away, illegal genetic experiment #626 is detected: Ruthless scientist Dr. Jumba Jookiba has created a strong, intelligent, nearly indestructible and aggressive being with only one known weakness: The high density of his body makes it impossible for the experiment to swim in water. The scientist is sentenced to jail by the Grand Council of the Galactic Federation. The experiment is supposed to be transported to a prison asteroid, yet manages to escape Captain Gantu, who was supposed to deliver him there. With a stolen police cruiser (the red one), the destructive being races towards a little and already doomed planet: Earth. Stranded on Hawaii, experiment #626 can't actually do much harm: water all around, no big cities and two well-equipped representatives of the Galactic Federation already following close behind to catch him again. But Dr. Jookiba and the Earth expert Pleakley never could have guessed that earth girl Lilo adopts the experiment as dog, gives him ...

movies.title: Gekijouban Fate/Stay Night: Unlimited Blade Works
movies.title_english: Gekijouban Fate/Stay Night: Unlimited Blade Works
movies.title_long: Gekijouban Fate/Stay Night: Unlimited Blade Works (2010)
movies.summary: The war for the Holy Grail is on. Master/Servant team pairs made up of Magi and the summoned spirits of legendary warriors do battle to the death in their quest for the right to claim the prize. The winning team claims the Grail and it's power to grant each of them a wish.
movies.description_full: The war for the Holy Grail is on. Master/Servant team pairs made up of Magi and the summoned spirits of legendary warriors do battle to the death in their quest for the right to claim the prize. The winning team claims the Grail and it's power to grant each of them a wish.
